definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: † [[זְוׇעָה]] and, by transpos., [[זַעֲוׇה]] (Di De 28:25 cf. Sta:§ 192 a)

definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: a trembling, i.e. object of trembling, terror: [[זְוׇעָה]] Is 28:19, also Kt Je 15:4 + 4 t.; [[זַעֲוׇה]] De 28:25, Ez Eze 23:46 (also Qr Je 15:4 + 4 t.);—object of trembling, terror, fright; [[זְהָיִיתָ לְזַעֲוׇה]] De 28:25 and thou shalt become a terror to al1 ([[לְכׂל]]) the kingdoms of the earth; ´[[וגו]] ´[[וּנְתַתִּים לְז]]) Je 15:4, Je 29:18, Je 34:17 (‖[[וְלִשְׁרֵקָה וּלְחֶרְפָּה לְאָלָה וּלְשַׁמָּה]]) also ´[[וגו]] ´[[וּנְתַתִּים לְז]] Je 24:9 (‖[[וּלְמָשָׁל לִשְׁנִינׇה וְלִקְלָלָה לְחֶרְפָּה]]), Ez Eze 23:46, 2Ch 29:8 .
